## RemirrorProps.onDispatchTransaction property

A method called when the editor is dispatching the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onDispatchTransaction: TransactionTransformer<SchemaFromExtensions<GExtension>>;
```

## Remarks

Use this to update the transaction which will be used to update the editor state.
